br.br: April 13, 2020 - Click here to view -->Letter to Families 4-13-2020.pdf

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);
font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

p.span: While Governor Wolf has extended the school closure, students will continue to be educated through the remainder of the school year based on our Continuity of Education plan. We will provide our weekly question/answer update on Facebook, our website, and through School Messenger on Monday, April 13th. Stay healthy and enjoy your Spring Break!

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);
font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

br.span: April 8, 2020 (Board approved at meeting) - Click here to view -->Saint Clair Continuity of Education Plan.pdf
br.br: April 5, 2020 - Click here to view -->Letter to Families 4-5-2020.pdf

p.br: March 30, 2020 -Governor Tom Wolfand Sec. of Health Expand Stay at Home Order to Carbon, Cumberland, Dauphin and Schuylkill Counties, Extend School Closures Indefinitely. We will continue to update you when we have more information.

p.style: margin: 6px 0px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-size: 14px;

div.p:
If a staff member did not connect with your family to pick up your child(ren)'s iPad(s) today, please follow up with us (570-291-8581 or email covely@saintclairsd.org).
~If you are able to drop off to us, please do so on Tuesday before noon.
~If you need us to pick up, please schedule a time for Tuesday.

span.br: March 29, 2020 - Click here to view -->Letter to Families 3-29-2020.pdf

div.h4:
Special Area Subjects Google Classroom Codes.pdf
Class Codes for Google Classroom.pdf
March 23, 2020-Governor Tom Wolfannounced new time frames for school closures in Pennsylvania earlier today. According to the official notification from thePennsylvania Department of Education, school staff will return on April 7th and 8th; students will return on April 9th. As stated in prior communications, we will take the time needed to evaluate this decision and provide additional details specific to our school district as needed. Please continue to check our website and Facebook page during that time. Thank you for your continued understanding and patience. Stay healthy!

strong.span: March 22, 2020 - Click here to view -->Continuity of Education Letter

span.style: font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

p.span: We hope all students will take the advice from Kindergarten teachers Mrs. Kull, Mrs. Maccarone, and Mrs. Sninsky to READ during this time. Please go to the FREE Resources using Saint Clair Area School Districts code of SCHOOL6739:

div.style: font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 6px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33);

div.p:
Breaking news - I received an email from Service Electric addressing your concerns with the offer of Internet to families in our district!
With students at home now in an eLearning environment,Service Electric Cablevision, Inc.(SECV) will offer 90 days free Internet service to students and teachers who do not already subscribe to SECV Internet. This offer includes the 40M x 4M tier of Internet service, along with a free cable modem rental. It applies only to new customers that have not subscribed to SECV Internet service within the last sixty (60) days. Self-installation required with the assistance of a technician outside the residence to ensure the safety of our employees. All new customers must provide written proof of their childs current enrollment at a local school in SECVs service area. All teachers must reside in SECVs service area and provide evidence of current employment status. Other restrictions may apply. For more information or to enroll in the eLearning offer, please call 877.955.7328.
If you need assistance with written proof of enrollment after contacting SECV, please contact our Virtual Office - 570-291-8581 or email covely@saintclairsd.org.
